channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 19:15 Repulse of the alarm in the city. Kyiv. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 19:15 Repulse of the alarm in the city. Kyiv. Stay tuned for further messages. #m_Kyiv This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 19:12 The alarm has been lifted in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still ongoing in:- Myrivska territorial community
item.description: 🟡 19:12 The alarm has been lifted in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still ongoing in:- Myrivska territorial community #Dnipropetrovsk_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 19:12 Alarm lifted in Donetsk region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 19:12 Alarm lifted in Donetsk region. Follow further messages. #Donetsk_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 7:11 p.m. The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyan district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchan territorial community
item.description: 🟡 7:11 p.m. The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyan district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchan territorial community#Харківська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
